name: XP
desc: This module provides a server XP system awarded based on participation in the server. XP will not be awarded or viewable while this module is disabled.
enabledMessage: Users will now be awarded XP based on participation in the server, and can view their XP with )xp and )xplb.
disabledMessage: XP will no longer be awarded in this server, and )xp and )xplb will no longer work.
